bioconda.name: sga
bioconda.summary: SGA - String Graph Assembler. SGA is a de novo assembler for DNA sequence reads. It is based on Gene Myers string graph formulation of assembly and uses the FM-index/Burrows-Wheeler transform to efficiently find overlaps between sequence reads.

biocontainers.name: sga
biocontainers.summary: Sga is a de novo assembler designed to assemble large genomes from high coverage short read data.

biotools.summary: SGA is a de novo assembler designed to assemble large genomes from high coverage short read data.

bioschemas.name: SGA
bioschemas.summary: SGA is a de novo assembler designed to assemble large genomes from high coverage short read data.
